title: Integrative Medicine » Department of Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation » College of Medicine » University of Florida
description: Integrative medicine is an approach to care that puts the patient at the center and addresses the full range of physical, emotional, mental, social, spiritual and environmental influences that affect a person's health. Integrative medicine brings together practices once considered "alternative" medicine, combined with the latest research and medical technology, to foster the connection between...
cleaned_text: an approach to care that puts the patient at the center and addresses the full range of physical, emotional, mental, social, spiritual and environmental influences that affect a person's health. Integrative medicine brings together practices once considered "alternative" medicine, combined with the latest research and medical technology, to foster the connection between the mind, body and spirit that is often missing in conventional medicine. Integrative medicine is an approach to care that puts the patient at the center and addresses the full range of physical, emotional, mental, social, spiritual and environmental influences that affect a person's health. Long COVID and Post-acute sequelae of SARS CoV-2 infection (PASC) Click here to join the [Registry for People with Long COVID](https://pmr.med.ufl.edu/research/currently-enrolling-studies/registry-for-people-with-long-covid/) for those interested in being contacted about Long COVID studies. This is a database; once contacted, you can decide whether to participate or not in the studies. To receive Long COVID or PASC Treatment, go to the UF Health COVID RESTORE Program clinic webpage Resources The Pulmonary Wellness Foundation has a Free Online Rehab Bootcamp for COVID-19 Survivors and long haulers dealing with Post-acute
